--- select_complex_with_unnest_array_path.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  ComplexTable,
  UNNEST(ComplexTable.IntArray)

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Results: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From: 11,
      Source: &ast.Join{
        Op: ",",
        Left: &ast.TableName{
          Table: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 18,
            NameEnd: 30,
            Name: "ComplexTable",
          },
        },
        Right: &ast.Unnest{
          Unnest: 34,
          Rparen: 62,
          Expr: &ast.Path{
            Idents: []*ast.Ident{
              &ast.Ident{
                NamePos: 41,
                NameEnd: 53,
                Name: "ComplexTable",
              },
              &ast.Ident{
                NamePos: 54,
                NameEnd: 62,
                Name: "IntArray",
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM ComplexTable, UNNEST(ComplexTable.IntArray)
